content: विहित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Done, performed, made, acted. {@--2@} Arranged, fixed, settled, appointed, determined. {@--3@} Ordered, prescribed, decreed; <ls>Pt. 1. 201.</ls> {@--4@} Framed, constructed. {@--5@} Placed, deposited {@--6@} Furnished with, possessed of. {@--7@} Fit to be done. {@--8@} Distributed, apportioned. (See धा with वि). --तं An order, a command, decree; परतो दवैविहितायत्तं <ls>Pt. 1.</ls>
